name: Cowboy Bebop
description: The Bebop crew is just trying to make a buck. This motley lot of intergalactic loners teams up to track down fugitives and turn them in for cold hard cash. Spike is a hero whose cool façade hides a dark and deadly past. The pilot Jet is a bruiser of a brute who can’t wait to collect the next bounty. Faye Valentine is a femme fatale prone to breaking hearts and separating fools from their money. Along for the ride are the brilliant, but weird, hacker Ed and a super-genius Welsh Corgi named Ein.

episodes.name: Asteroid Blues
episodes.description: Spike and Jet head to Tijuana to track down an outlaw smuggling a dangerous drug known as blood-eye. Jet wants the bounty, but Spike has eyes for a far prettier prize.

episodes.name: Stray Dog Strut
episodes.description: Spike and Jet’s next case takes them to Mars, where they’ll to try apprehend a professional pet thief and a priceless data dog.

episodes.name: Honky Tonk Women
episodes.description: A night at the casino lands Spike and Jet in hot water when they cross paths with Faye Valentine, a stunning con artist wanted by the law – and the bad guys.

episodes.name: Gateway Shuffle
episodes.description: Faye teams up with Spike and Jet to track down a gang of space activists that plans on turning the human population into monkeys!

episodes.name: Ballad of Fallen Angels
episodes.description: Spike aims to collect the bounty on a member of the Red Dragon Syndicate, but his mission leads him into a deadly showdown with a face from his past!

episodes.name: Sympathy for the Devil
episodes.description: The latest case for the crew of the Bebop finds Spike pitted against a young boy with a talent for the harmonica – and murder.

episodes.name: Heavy Metal Queen
episodes.description: The Bebop crew pursues a renegade explosives expert, and Spike crosses paths with a nameless space trucker that hates bounty hunters.

episodes.name: Waltz for Venus
episodes.description: Spike gets involved with a fugitive who is willing to risk his own life to restore his sister’s sight. Can the Bebop crew save the day before tragedy strikes?

episodes.name: Jamming with Edward
episodes.description: The Bebop crew tries to crack the case of mysterious satellite drawings appearing on the Earth’s surface, but they’ll need help from a hacker know as Radical Edward to earn their bounty!

episodes.name: Ganymede Elegy
episodes.description: When a case takes the Bebop crew to Jet’s old stomping ground, the big man crosses paths with an old lover – and her wanted boyfriend.

episodes.name: Toys in the Attic
episodes.description: When an unusual, blob-like space creature infects Ein, Faye, and Jet, Spike and Radical Edward must figure out a way to save their friends.

episodes.name: Jupiter Jazz (part 1)
episodes.description: Faye robs and abandons the Bebop crew, Spike goes in search of a woman he once knew, and Vicious makes another deadly appearance.

episodes.name: Jupiter Jazz (part 2)
episodes.description: Jet continues his mission to reunite his Bebop comrades, and Spike finds himself locked in a brutal dogfight with his old nemesis Vicious.

episodes.name: Bohemian Rhapsody
episodes.description: The Bebop Crew embarks on a wild goose chase of a bounty hunt that leads them deep into space in search of an ancient chess master.

episodes.name: My Funny Valentine
episodes.description: When Jet brings in a fugitive from Faye’s past, the rebellious beauty must decide whether to turn him in – or give an old flame one last chance.

episodes.name: Black Dog Serenade
episodes.description: Jet teams up with a former partner to settle the score with the man who took his arm, but he soon discovers that memories can be deceiving.

episodes.name: Mushroom Samba
episodes.description: After the Bebop crash lands, Ed and Ein’s search for food turns up some very expensive mushrooms with psychedelic side effects!

episodes.name: Speak Like a Child
episodes.description: When a mysterious package arrives, Faye disappears on a gambling binge, and Spike and Jet embark on a frustrating search for ancient technology!

episodes.name: Wild Horses
episodes.description: While Spike pays a visit to the man who built his ship, Faye and Jet go fishing for space pirates.

episodes.name: Pierrot Le Fou
episodes.description: Spike takes a beating during a chance encounter with an indestructible assassin. While Jet searches for the secret to the madman’s power, Spike goes looking for payback!

episodes.name: Boogie Woogie Feng Shui
episodes.description: Spurred by a cryptic email, Jet goes looking for an old friend, but finds his daughter – and a mysterious sun stone – instead.

episodes.name: Cowboy Funk
episodes.description: Spike’s attempts to apprehend the infamous Teddy Bear Bomber are maddeningly derailed by a mysterious – and clueless – cowboy!

episodes.name: Brain Scratch
episodes.description: Faye goes undercover to collect the bounty on a deranged cult leader, but when the mysterious organization brainwashes her into a very deep sleep – she’ll need a little help from her friends.

episodes.name: Hard Luck Woman
episodes.description: Faye and Ed discover clues to their respective pasts that could send the crew of the Bebop heading in very different directions.

episodes.name: The Real Folk Blues (part 1)
episodes.description: Spike and Jet are ambushed by members of the syndicate, and Faye has an unexpected encounter with a woman from Spike’s past.

episodes.name: The Real Folk Blues (part 2)
episodes.description: Spike finally finds the woman he’s been searching for, and Faye makes a surprising return to the Bebop. With the syndicate in hot pursuit, Spike seeks to end the reign of Vicious.
